scripts.dev: npx wrangler pages dev --port 3000 -- npx next dev --port 3001
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx wrangler pages dev out --port 3000
scripts.d1:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply instinct-test-db --local
scripts.d1:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply instinct-test-db --remote
